## IAnsiEscapeConvertForTestsOptions.encodeNewlines property

If true then `\n` will be replaced by `[n]`<!-- -->, and `\r` will be replaced by `[r]`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
encodeNewlines?: boolean;
```
